channel.title: BUscience
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from BUscience, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Matching dinosaur footprints found on opposite sides of the Atlantic Ocean
item.description: An international team of paleontologists has found matching sets of Early Cretaceous dinosaur footprints on what are now two different continents.

item.title: Why children can't pay attention to the task at hand
item.description: Scientists have learned that children find it hard to focus on a task, and often take in information that won't help them complete their assignment. B...

item.title: New NSF centers will take a multidisciplinary approach to pandemic prediction and prevention
item.description: Early detection and prevention of potential pandemics — whether they affect humans, animals or plants — are vital to the health, economy and security ...
